data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample NYUCHPLA-241

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Halbt. podsolsand, kr. tr. Sa, av. Tree height 29 m, Tree cover 70%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Pinetum vaccinoso-hylocomiosum, Film number: 935A
